law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 9-208 of this subtitle, each motor carrier shall:...

text.section:
Except as provided in § 9-208 of this subtitle, each motor carrier shall:
complete, under oath, and file a motor carrier tax return for periods that the Comptroller requires; and
provide other information that the Comptroller considers necessary to enforce this subtitle properly.

To identify properly persons listed in a return, each motor carrier shall include in the return:
the Social Security number or other federal identifying number of the person; and
if the Comptroller requires, United States Department of Transportation (US DOT) identification number.
